alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 16 at 2:19AM AKST until December 19 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Skagway and Downtown Juneau. * WHEN...From late Friday night through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures will be in place throughout this event leading to possible wind chills of 15 - to -25 degrees below zero beginning late Saturday night. Colder wind chills can be expected near White Pass.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Municipality of Skagway
